query-mapping.description: Queries used to display the list of posts.

class.name: AWA.Blogs.Models.Post_Info
class.comment: The Post_Info describes a post to be displayed in the blog page

property.name: allow_comments
property.comment: the post allows to add comments.

property.name: comment_count
property.comment: the number of comments for this post.

query.name: blog-post-list
query.comment: Get the list of public visible posts
query.sql: SELECT post.id, post.title, post.uri, post.publish_date, u.name, post.format, post.summary, post.text, post.allow_comments, count(cmt.id) FROM awa_post AS post INNER JOIN awa_user AS u ON post.author_id = u.id LEFT JOIN awa_comment AS cmt ON cmt.entity_id = post.id AND cmt.entity_type = :entity_type AND cmt.status = 0 WHERE post.status > 0 GROUP BY post.id, u.id ORDER BY post.publish_date DESC LIMIT :count OFFSET :first
query.sql-count: SELECT count(post.id) FROM awa_post AS post WHERE post.status > 0

query.name: blog-post-tag-list
query.comment: Get the list of public visible posts filtered by a tag
query.sql: SELECT post.id, post.title, post.uri, post.publish_date, u.name, post.format, post.summary, post.text, post.allow_comments, count(distinct cmt.id) FROM awa_post AS post INNER JOIN awa_user AS u ON post.author_id = u.id INNER JOIN awa_tagged_entity AS e ON e.for_entity_id = post.id AND e.entity_type = :entity_type AND e.tag_id = :tag LEFT JOIN awa_comment AS cmt ON cmt.entity_id = post.id AND cmt.entity_type = :entity_type AND cmt.status = 0 WHERE post.status > 0 GROUP BY post.id, u.id ORDER BY post.publish_date DESC LIMIT :count OFFSET :first
query.sql-count: SELECT count(distinct post.id) FROM awa_post AS post INNER JOIN awa_tagged_entity AS e ON e.for_entity_id = post.id AND e.entity_type = :entity_type AND e.tag_id = :tag WHERE post.status > 0
